meanings.definition: More newsworthy: more interesting or important enough to be reported as news.
meanings.sent1: The newsworthier story made it to the front page of the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The car accident was deemed newsworthier than the local bake sale.
meanings.sent3: The cat's newsworthier antics involved stealing socks and hiding them in the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her newsworthier discovery in the attic was a box of forgotten love letters.
meanings.sent5: The newsworthier event of the year was the grand opening of the new community center.
